xwikidoc.name: BrowseWorkspacesLiveTableResults
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: $msg.get("platform.livetable.results")
xwikidoc.content:
{{include document="WorkspaceManager.BrowseWorkspacesLiveTableResultsMacros" /}}
{{velocity wiki="false"}} #set($from = ", BaseObject as wikiObj, BaseObject as workspaceObj") #set($extra = "AND wikiObj.className='XWiki.XWikiServerClass' AND wikiObj.name = doc.fullName AND workspaceObj.className='WorkspaceManager.WorkspaceClass' AND workspaceObj.name = doc.fullName AND (not exists (from IntegerProperty as templateProp where templateProp.id = wikiObj.id AND templateProp.name='iswikitemplate') OR exists (from IntegerProperty as templateProp where templateProp.id = wikiObj.id AND templateProp.name='iswikitemplate' AND templateProp.value = 0))") ##set($from = "") ##set($extra = "") #set($params = []) #if("$!request.space" != '') #set($extra = "${extra} and doc.space = ?") #set($discard = $params.add("$request.space")) #end #if("$!request.orphaned" == '1') #set($extra = "${extra} and doc.parent='' and doc.name<>'WebHome'") #end #gridresultwithfilter("$!request.classname" $request.collist.split(",") "${from}" "${extra}" $params) {{/velocity}}
